casebody.data:
No. 09-1477. Brotherhood of Maintenance of Way Employees Division, et al., Petitioners v. BNSF Railway Company, et al. 562 U.S. 836, 131 S. Ct. 151,

178 L. Ed. 2d 38,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5814. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 596 F.3d 1217.
